title: Unable to play
body: Just started a game and it crashes, i relog and it crashes again and it wont stop, plz help

replies.body: Is this still happening to you?

I'm getting the same here. Started my first game after the patch and it just crashes after about 5 seconds of being in game. I have repaired the game and it's still doing. Was working perfectly fine before the patch.

Hey Guys I have the same problem, I get this message when Game starts...
''League of Legends (TM) Client has stopped working''

Any1 fix it? if yes please provide me with some solutions. 

Thanks.
Ditto. I'm running a repair now to see if it fixes it. Incidentally, I'm using Bard, so maybe some of those assets are broken?
I solved my problem.. it seems i didnt have enough spare space on my SSD for it to install properly. probably not everyones issue but after clearing a few gb mine installs without an issue now.
Doubt that's my issue. Over 60gb free for me. Hopefully the repair will fix it. Feel bad for my team I abandoned though, at least it was just an AI :P
Mine keeps getting to 99% then crashes. retry it and it scans files and crashes
Same here.  Patch 5.5 started the crashing.
